info.title: LangBot API with API Key Authentication
info.description:
LangBot External Service API Documentation. These interfaces support API key authentication for external systems to programmatically access LangBot resources.

**Authentication Methods:**
- User Token (via `Authorization: Bearer <token>`)
- API Key (via `X-API-Key: <key>` or `Authorization: Bearer <key>`)

All interfaces in this documentation support both authentication methods.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all configured LLM models

post.description: Create and configure a new LLM model

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific LLM model by UUID

put.description: Update the configuration of an existing LLM model

delete.description: Remove an LLM model from the system

post.description: Test the connectivity and functionality of an LLM model

get.description: Retrieve a list of all configured embedding models

post.description: Create and configure a new embedding model

get.description: Retrieve a list of all configured bot instances

post.description: Create and configure a new bot instance

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific bot instance

put.description: Update the configuration of an existing bot instance

delete.description: Remove a bot instance from the system

post.description: Retrieve event logs for a specific bot

from_index.description: Starting index for logs (-1 for latest)

max_count.description: Maximum number of logs to retrieve

get.description: Retrieve a list of all configured pipelines

post.description: Create and configure a new pipeline

get.description: Retrieve metadata and configuration options for pipelines
Retrieve details of a specific pipeline

put.description: Update the configuration of an existing pipeline

delete.description: Remove a pipeline from the system

get.description: Retrieve extensions and plugins configured for a pipeline

put.description: Update the extensions configuration for a pipeline

post.description: Upload image file (supports jpg, jpeg, png, gif, webp, max 10MB)

get.description: Get list of all installed plugins
Get details of a specific plugin

post.description: Upload and install plugin package file
Install plugin from LangBot plugin marketplace
Send a message to a specific target via the specified bot

target_id.description: Target ID (user ID or group ID)

msg.example: Failed to send message: Bot not found

get.description: Get details info of specified knowledge base
Get all files in the specified knowledge base

post.description: Add uploaded file to knowledge base for processing

delete.description: Delete file from the specified knowledge base

post.description: Search for relevant knowledge in the knowledge base

ApiKeyAuth.name: X-API-Key
ApiKeyAuth.description:
API Key authentication using X-API-Key header.
Example: `X-API-Key: lbk_your_api_key_here`

BearerAuth.description:
Bearer token authentication. Can be either a user JWT token or an API key.
Example: `Authorization: Bearer <token_or_key>`

value.msg: No valid authentication provided (user token or API key required)
